title: Palo Alto Battlefield National Historical Park: Donate
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Donate            Donate       You Can Help Would you like to become part of the Palo Alto Battlefield family? By volunteering your time, or just by visiting the park and its bookstore, you can help us continue to protect this important historical site. Donate Monetary donations are graciously accepted and directly benefit the park. Your donation will enhance programs, activities and help provide other visitor services at the park. Your charitable contributions make a significant difference and we welcome and are grateful for your support. Palo Alto is able to accept direct donations. If you are interested in donating to the park, contact the Superintendent at 956-541-2785 ext. 222 or send donations to: Palo Alto Battlefield National Historical Park Attn: Superintendent 1623 Central Blvd., Suite 213 Brownsville, TX 78520
